If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, , and read on.
The spectre pauses. It swirls and pulses, as if undecided. Then you hear an ethereal voice echoing through the tunnel.
'At last, a true believer has come,' moans the ghost of Kizil Irmak. 'And you are worthy.'

Suddenly, the apparition disappears, leaving a sword on the ground that flickers with a luminescent pale energy. Note the
on your Adventure Sheet. You are unable to use it yourself (it burns your hand) but you are able to carry it.
